page.title: 09LIFE STYLES
page.content: WE LOOKED AT THE LIFE STYLE OF A LOCAL FAMILY,THE ROBINSONS.MR ROBINSON WORKS FOR ICI AND WORKS SHIFTS.MRS ROBINSON WORKS PART-TIME IN A LOCAL SHOP.THEY HAVE TWO CHILDREN,LINDA WHO IS TEN AND JOEY WHO IS EIGHT. THE ROBINSONS OWN A THREE-BEDROOMED SEMI-DETACHED HOUSE.THEY OWN A CAR AND A CARAVAN AND DURING THE SUMMER THEY SPEND MUCH OF THEIR LEISURE TIME ON HOLIDAY,ON A CARAVAN SITE IN WALES. MR AND MRS ROBINSON BOTH PLAY DARTS FOR A NEARBY CLUB TEAM.THE CLUB HAS A ROOM FOR CHILDREN,WHICH MEANS THAT THEY CAN GO OUT AS A FAMILY AT CERTAIN TIMES.MR ROBINSON IS ON THE CLUB COMMITTEE AND HELPS TO ORGANISE SOCIAL EVENTS FOR THE MEMBERS. WHEN THEY ARE NOT AT SCHOOL,LINDA AND JOEY STAY AT THEIR GRANDPARENTS HOUSE. THEY ARE MEMBERS OF THE LOCAL GIRL GUIDES AND BOY SCOUTS RESPECTIVELY.
